data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 4, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Nagoya's Yuichi Maruyama breaks free at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Kashiwa are coming forward and Michael Olunga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 10, Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 12, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Kashiwa Kashiwa attack through Michael Olunga. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashiwa's Cristiano misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 19, Yusuke Araki awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Nagoya drives forward and Mateus gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 22, Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Kashiwa.
Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Kashiwa's area.
Yusuke Araki signals a Nagoya throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Nagoya at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kashiwa.
Can Nagoya capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 25, Nagoya are pushing forward but Mateus's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 28, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Yusuke Araki awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Nagoya's Yuki Soma gets in a shot on goal at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Gabriel Xavier of Nagoya gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 33, Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 35, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, In Kashiwa, Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 45, Mateus for Nagoya drives towards goal at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa have a dangerous throw-in.
Kashiwa attack but Michael Olunga's header doesn't find the target.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 48, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Yusuke Araki signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Yuki Soma is on target to give Nagoya a 0-1 advantage.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, In Kashiwa Kashiwa drive forward through Michael Olunga. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Kashiwa's Takuma Ominami misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
Takuma Ominami for Kashiwa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 58, Massimo Ficcadenti is making the team's first substitution at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium with Naoki Maeda replacing Gabriel Xavier.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Shunki Takahashi is replacing Kengo Kitazume for the home team.
In the minute 66, Yusuke Araki awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Nagoya needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
In the minute 67, Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Kashiwa.
Kashiwa's Cristiano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
In the minute 69, The home team have replaced Ataru Esaka with Yuta Kamiya. This is the second substitution made today by Nelsinho Baptista.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nelsinho Baptista (Kashiwa) is making a third substitution, with Hiroto Goya replacing Cristiano.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Nagoya.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kashiwa.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 76, Takuma Ominami (Kashiwa) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
The home team replace Masatoshi Mihara with Yusuke Kobayashi.
Hayato Nakama is replacing Yusuke Segawa for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya just outside Kashiwa's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
In the minute 81, In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, At Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium, Kashiwa are penalized for being offside.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Shunki Takahashi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
In the minute 88, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Mitch Langerak.
Shumpei Naruse is on a sub for Hiroyuki Abe for Nagoya.
Mitch Langerak is back on the pitch.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Nagoya will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kashiwa.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kashiwa's Yuta Kamiya gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yusuke Araki signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
Yuichi Maruyama is booked for the away team.
